## ICopy interface

Generic interface for clonable types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICopy<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [copy()](./api.icopy.copy.md) | Returns a copy of this instance. Shallow or deep copies are implementation specific. |
